0.1.name: wordpress/anobii-wordpress-widget
0.1.description:
aNobii WordPress Widget is a Wordpress widget which shows randomly the covers of some books from your aNobii's shelf.

Changelog:

1.1 - Now you can: * choose the size of the covers (small, large or square) * exclude books without covers * choose the most recent books instead of only showing them randomly * filtering the books by reading progress (all, reading, finished, reading+finished)

1.0 - It works on Internet Explorer 7!
